column4: hey ppl, I head the next release of GAIM, ver 2.0 will ship many new features such as webcam chat and voice chat
GAIM v2.0 will have invisible login status option at the main login menu
i am also monitoring the CVS Rhythmbox, the next version of Rhythm box will ship CD-Audio playbak, and expiremental ID3Tag editor
but can it play daapd streamed music?
